transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir, I am Swati speaking from IndiaMART, how are you sir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Call aaya hai na IndiaMART mein.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan, toh aapne kis liye call kiya tha sir, koi issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Madam, main abhi thoda function mein hu, kisi mein aapko do ghante baad call karunga ek baar.
Executive: Achcha, actually ticket raise ho jaati hai na aap call karte hain toh.
Customer: Bata do sir, aapko kya hai. Abhi main kya ki, gadi drive kar raha hu, ja raha hu. Abhi baat ho nahi payegi na.
Executive: Achcha, toh yeh ticket close kar du kya sir agar koi concern nahi hai toh?
Customer: Hai, problem toh hai, woh baat kehni hai, woh kehni hai na thoda. Gadi drive kar raha hu, ja raha hu main.
Executive: Achcha, toh abhi batao aap kitni der mein phir call karein hum aapko?
Customer: Aap 4 baje kar dijiye.
Executive: 4 baje kar lein sir, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Kyunki phir ticket bhi close karna rahega na, aapka concern close karke.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek, okay, namaste.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has an issue to discuss.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer back at 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call back, ticket, concern
